NEW: Prestige Points - It's now easier than ever to do the things you love!

Story Goals are now in Chapters, a story-driven experience, and will no longer be the only way to Prestige up.

Reach the next Prestige level by earning Prestige Points from the following activities:
-Completing Story Goals
-Racing
-Breeding
-Training
-Foal Bonuses

This update delivers a bunch of features to prepare you for our next big update!
You will soon be able to specialize your horses into Horse Types: Racing & Riding.
New stats have been added: Agility and Jump. These cannot be trained yet and will only be used in the new mode.

NEW: Introducing a New Riding Mode: Time Trial!
Ride your horse through the gates as fast as you can to beat the clock and earn rewards!
Train your horses' Agility stat to help them navigate tight turns in the Time Trial courses
Riding type horses are needed to enter Time Trial - specialize your horses' type between Racing and Riding

More updates and improvements are coming soon to Rival Stars Horse Racing!

- Improvements to post-race flow to help get you back into the racing action quicker!
- Introduction to horse specialization for Time Trial mode

- Introduction to horse specialization for Time Trial mode

- NEW: Daily Rewards - For the first 7 days new players will receive rewards for each day that they login. Existing players will also have access to these rewards. These rewards can only be claimed on the day so don’t forget to login!
- We've also made some improvements to Time Trial mode to help players in their quest to achieve the best times possible!

- We've also made some improvements to Time Trial mode to help players in their quest to achieve the best times possible!

- NEW: Free Roam (formerly known as Quick Ride) is now permanently available to enjoy! Head over to the Race & Ride menu to explore your ranch with your favorite horses!

Beta test upcoming features!
An early version of Jumping is available to test in Free Roam.
We encourage you to try out the mode and give us feedback on your experience via our community page or by emailing us at support@pikpok.com.
We’ll continue to improve the feature based on the feedback received.

An early version of Cross Country is available for testing!
This new Riding mode will have you riding through various courses, jumping over fences and gates, and perfecting your skills.
Finishing courses with the least amount of penalty points will yield the highest rewards - including Jump Feed.
This Feed is used for training your Jump stat and is crucial for building stamina.

Can't get enough of Rival Star Horse Racing? Check out our social channels for the latest news on upcoming content and features! 
- Star Club Exclusive! Star Club members now have access to 4 additional horse stalls!
- Added an assortment of horse coats and patterns

We’ve listened to your feedback about specializing your horses.
In this update, the option to specialize horses has been permanently removed.
This means you can use any of your horses to compete in both Races and Cross Country.
We hope this change means you’ll get to spend more time with your favourite horses!

We’ve listened to your feedback about specializing your horses.
In this update, the option to specialize horses has been permanently removed.
This means you can use any of your horses to compete in both Races and Cross Country.
We hope this change means you’ll get to spend more time with your favourite horses!

Create teams with your friends
Rally your friends, form a legendary team, and leave your legacy in Rival Stars Horse Racing - It’s time to get the team together!
Compete against other teams in weekly global leaderboards by earning points in live events. The prize? Bragging rights and glory of course - but mainly the bragging rights.
Create a team or join one from the main hub.
